<title level="1" pfs="">[Loakan](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1631)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 32

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Loakan](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1631)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 28</row>

**Perception** +13

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Iruxi](/Languages.aspx?ID=32)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +12, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +14, [Cooking Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +10, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [greatclub](/Weapons.aspx?ID=22)_, recipe books

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 100

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, swim 15 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_greatclub_ +17 ([Backswing](/Traits.aspx?ID=173), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)),
**Damage** 1d10+6 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +16 ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d8+6 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +16,
**Damage** 1d6+6 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
book +16 ([range increment 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 bludgeoning

**Battering Tail** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Loakan makes a greatclub Strike and two tail Strikes against the same creature. If the greatclub Strike hits, the target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against both tail Strikes.

**Deep Breath**   Loakan can hold her breath for 200 rounds (20 minutes)

</column>
name: Loakan
